definition: cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，论文明天应交，否则后果由个人负责。

sentences.english: The rebel lawmakers denounced his proposal as reckless.
sentences.chinese: 内讧的议员斥责他的提案不顾后果。

sentences.english: Even the consequences of glacier retreat are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 人们甚至对冰川退缩的后果也不太清楚。

sentences.english: Love them enough to allow them to experience the consequences of their actions.
sentences.chinese: 爱他们足以让他们感受到自己的行为产生的后果。

sentences.english: The outcome for those folks was death.
sentences.chinese: 派普博士说，“那些当地人的后果就是死亡。”

sentences.english: And God says sooner or later you will have to face the consequences of your sin.
sentences.chinese: 神说或早或晚你都要面对罪的后果。

sentences.english: CNS infections may be associated with brain atrophy, with resultant microcephaly and ventriculomegaly.
sentences.chinese: 有关，伴有小头畸形和脑室扩大的后果。

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同时也束缚了司法机关的手脚，造成宽纵罪犯的后果。

sentences.english: Fear of consequences is a common deterrent from wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 一般不做坏事遏阻原因是害怕后果。

sentences.english: Third, the adverse consequences of overheated investment in some industries are becoming apparent.
sentences.chinese: 三是部分行业过度投资的不良后果开始显现。

sentences.english: I write what I think, without really thinking about the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 我写我思考的东西，没有真正考虑会产生的后果。

sentences.english: Nine younger sister listen to happy old man say that finish context, immediately agreed.
sentences.chinese: 九妹听神医老人说完前因后果，立即点头答应。

sentences.english: Force is a physical power, and I fail to see what moral effect it can have.
sentences.chinese: 强力是一种物质力量，我看不出它具有什么道德后果。

sentences.english: After careful investigation，he got to know the ins and outs of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 经过仔细的调查，他终于弄清了事件的前因后果。

sentences.english: The play the causes and effects of logical relationship is roughly such.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的前因后果逻辑关系大致是这样的。

sentences.english: Now, we will all have to face the aftermath,” he said.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我们所有人都将要面临此种后果，”他说道。

definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
